movie.title: The Current War: Director's Cut
movie.plot: The dramatic story of the cutthroat race between electricity titans Thomas Edison and George Westinghouse to determine whose electrical system would power the modern world.

events.title: Thomas Edison demonstrates his new electric light bulb at Menlo Park
